Santiago tried to evaluate an expression step by step.

$\qquad\begin{align}
&(4 \cdot 10^9) \cdot 0.00003 \\\\
\\
=&(4 \cdot 10^9) \cdot (3\cdot10^{-5})&\green{\text{Step } 1}\\\\
\\
=&(4\cdot3)\cdot(10^9\cdot10^{-5})&\blue{\text{Step } 2}\\\\
\\
=&12 \cdot10^{14}&\purple{\text{Step } 3} \\\\
